dev.kkorolyov.pancake.component

Class Chain

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.component.Chain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dev.kkorolyov.pancake.entity.Component

    public class Chain
extends java.lang.Object
implements dev.kkorolyov.pancake.entity.Component
    Maintains references to a single positional and multiple rotational anchors. Moves towards the positional anchor when the distance between the anchor and the chained entity passes some threshold. Faces towards the nearest rotational anchor.
